name: get_zip_code_info
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool zippopotam_us.
Tool description: Zip Code Galore!
Zip·po·pot·amus   /ˈzipōpätəməs/
Postal Codes and Zip Codes made easy

Free API with JSON Response Format

Over 60 Countries Supported

Perfect for Form Autocompletion

Open for Crowdsourcing and Contribution
API description: Fetches information about a given postal code in a specified country using the Zippopotamus API.

country.description: The country code (e.g., 'us' for the United States).

postal_code.description: The postal code for which information is being fetched.
